short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to highlight text on the page and quickly get AI to generate responses without leaving the website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
intelli-text: Trainable AI Assistant Right in Your Browser

Experience the next level of browser-based communication with intelli-text, an extension that's not just smart but also trainable. Highlight any text on a webpage and watch as our AI not only generates a response but does so while adhering to your specific policies, procedures, and preferences.

Key Features:

1. Trainable AI Mechanism: Unlike standard AI assistants, intelli-text can be trained to your specific policies and procedures. Make it your own, ensuring it's always in line with your guidelines.

2. Policy-Citing Responses: When generating replies, our AI can automatically cite your established policies and procedures, enhancing clarity and authority in communication.

3. Data Privacy First: Your sensitive information remains yours. Intelli-text is built with a zero-storage policy for user-specific data.

4. Custom Profiles & Templates: Tailor the AI's voice with profiles and templates. It can remember your style, common phrases, and more.

5. Limitless Customization: Create unlimited custom templates, enabling the AI to generate responses infused with your personal or organizational touch.

6. Free 7-Day Trial: Dive into the full intelli-text experience with a 100% free 7-day trial. Start without a credit card and rest easy knowing we only store your email for trial verification.

Revolutionize your online engagements. With intelli-text, you're not just getting an AI - you're getting YOUR AI. Join our community and save an average of 10-20 hours every week.
